description:
In this very first meetup, we will host a 1 hour talk on CloudFormation. We start simple and work towards an infrastructure entirely built on CloudFormation. We'll also review on how configuration management systems like Chef, Puppet and Ansible can be tied in to this process.

Drinks and snacks will be provided.

venue.name: ICAB Business & Technology Incubator
venue.address_1: Witte Patersstraat 4 rue de Peres Blancs

name: #1 Kick-off meetup

description:
Topics:

• Use Cases for AWS, by Alex Sinner, AWS Solutions Architect

• EC2/S3 best practices for network performance, by skyscrapers  

This meetup is kindly sponsored by Skyscrapers.
name: #2 AWS Use Cases & EC2/S3 Best practices

description: In this talk we'll have a deeper look on how to cut your bill drasticaly by using spot and reserved instances in a highly available way.

venue.name: ICAB Business & Technology Incubator
venue.address_1: Witte Patersstraat 4 rue de Peres Blancs

name: #3 EC2 Spot vs. Reserved Instances

description:
This meetup will be hosted in pure Barcamp style. Everyone is invited, beginners to pro's. Topics are picked on the spot based on audience interest. 

Have an itch? Want to share your knowledge? Want to know more about certain services? Having trouble to get started?

Join us!

Hope to see you there.
name: #4 Barcamp

description:
Hello,

After a summer break we are back in full force, and have scheduled something nice to get back on track. And be sure to note it in your agenda as Amazon Web Services promised a gift for the first 20 attendees that show up!

An expert from AWS will come over to talk about:

1. Building Powerful Web Apps on AWS
We'll see in a live demo how to implement an elastic and highly available web architecture using EC2, Elastic Load Balancing, Auto Scaling, RDS, DynamoDB and CloudFront to for content delivery.

2. Building Cloud-powered Mobile Apps
Focus your time on what really matters and manage authentication, authorization, data synchronisation, user tracking, push notifications and real-time data streaming for your mobile apps with AWS Mobile Services.


This next meetup is kindly sponsored by the University of Antwerp, who will be hosting at their venue, at Middelheimlaan 1 in Antwerp (parking via Floralienlaan).

Besides drinks, we'll also foresee some food (we'll come back on this later). 

Hope to see you there!

Nils & Frederik
name: #5 Web and Mobile Apps on AWS
